title: Spice up your home decor with this on-sale Alexa-compatible lamp
content:
Hello, cold weather! Now that you’re spending a whole lot more time in your small, drafty Bay Area space, you may be jonesing for some quick fixes to make your space all the cozier. You’re not trying hard enough to paint your walls or spend tons of money on a new couch, or anything. Just a little pick-me-up. 

Time to meet the Smart RGB Ambient Light. This little light mixes together all the best things about that chic little lamp you’ve been eyeing on the stupidly expensive home retailer with all the things you love about your smart home, and it’s on sale. 

Check out this video for more specs: 

With this nifty little guy, you can choose your ambiance, with everything from warm light hues to romantic, moody colors. With 16 million shades to choose from, you can probably find a couple you’re into. It’s also really smart: we’re talking compatibility with Alexa, Google Home, and its own app. It even dances to your music! 

The Smart RGB Ambient Light normally costs $69, but for a limited time, you can get it for only $54.99. 

Price subject to change
